mapper.insert: insert into basket(id, member_id, product_id) values(#{id}, #{member_id}, #{product_id})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, p.subject, p.img, p.amount, b.count, (p.amount)*(b.count) subprice FROM product p JOIN basket b ON p.id = b.product_id WHERE b.member_id=#{member_id}
SELECT sum((p.amount)*(b.count)) FROM product p JOIN basket b ON p.id = b.product_id WHERE b.member_id=#{member_id}
